item.title: By: ej
item.dc:creator: ej
item.description: I am not clear how generation Y and Z correspond to different stages of MO. I haven't recovered from the baby boomers.Could you elaborate how this mapping is supposed to work? You write " They want to do it as religious individuals not as self-obsessed consumers or submissive to an authoritarian hierarchy." I am not clear what they would (should) say about the following video...consumerist, authoritarian, existentially lonely? http://www.youtube.com/embed/paH0V6JLxSI

item.title: By: Jeff Wild
item.dc:creator: Jeff Wild
item.description: Your post made me think about Nikos Kazantzakis and his descriptions of a heroic spiritual journey in his writings. A spiritual journey of "Saviors of God," which in some sad way has turned into the simple, easy spirituality of today. Makes me think I should read him again.
